topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Horizon Service Overview

body.p: Horizon is the OpenStack(R) service that serves as the basis for the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) web interface or dashboards.
The dashboards provide a web-based user interface to HPE Helion OpenStack(R) services including Compute, Volume Operations, Networking, and Identity.

Horizon ships with several dashboards, including a Project dashboard, an Admin dashboard, and a System dashboard. These dashboards provide administrators and users with a graphical interface to access, provision and automate cloud-based resources.

section.title: For more information
section.p: For information on using the dashboards, see HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Dashboard.
